definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

pinyin: bing3 suan1 fu2 ti4 ka3 song1

sentences.english: All cfc coolants must be removed from fridges.
sentences.chinese: 必须将所有的氟氯化碳冷却液从冰箱中去除。

sentences.english: In this paper, asymmetric microporous poly (vinylidene fluoride) (PVDF)membranes were prepared by phase-inversion process.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用相转换法制备了聚偏氟乙烯不对称微孔膜。

sentences.english: Difluorobiphenyl is the key intermediate for the synthesis of antipyretic analgesic Diflunisal.
sentences.chinese: 二氟联苯是合成消炎镇痛药氟苯水杨酸的关键中间体。

sentences.english: Conclusion Electromagnetic fields can be used to reduce turbidity value and fluoride in water.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨复合电磁场降低水的浑浊度和除氟功能。

sentences.english: Objective To compare the curative effects and safety of trazodone vs.
sentences.chinese: 目的比较曲唑酮与氟西汀治疗抑郁症的疗效及安全性。

sentences.english: A new method of determinations of fluoroquinolone drugs was developed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了测定氟喹诺酮类药物含量的一种新方法。

sentences.english: I had to use an acetate fluocinolone ointment, one just fine .
sentences.chinese: 我只好用了一次醋酸氟轻松软膏，一次就好了。

sentences.english: Determination of the related substances in dexibuprofen gel by HPLC;
sentences.chinese: 应用高效液相色谱法测定左旋氟比洛芬中的有关物质。

sentences.english: The results showed that there was not coal-pollution-burned endemic fluorosis in north of Huai River, Anhui.
sentences.chinese: 提示安徽淮北地区不存在燃煤污染型地方性氟中毒。

sentences.english: All CFC coolants musts be removed from fridges.
sentences.chinese: 必须将所有的氟氯化碳冷却液从冰箱中去除。

sentences.english: GC quantitative analysis method is established for pentafluoroethyl iodide analysis.
sentences.chinese: 建立了五氟碘乙烷进行气相色谱定量分析方法。

sentences.english: Lead or annealed copper washers are most often used in fluorine and other reactive fluoride service.
sentences.chinese: 铅或退火铜垫圈最经常用于氟和其它活泼氟化物设施。

sentences.english: Fluorine is the special non-metal element in tea.
sentences.chinese: 氟是茶中含有的特殊非金属元素。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the effect of fluorine on the amelogenin gene expression of mus musculus incisors.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨氟对小鼠釉原蛋白基因表达的影响。

sentences.english: Conclusions There was cross-resistance of flouroquinolone agents.
sentences.chinese: 结论氟喹诺酮类抗菌药物存在交叉耐药性。

sentences.english: Process for the preparation of fluoboric acid from fluosilicic acid, a byproduct of phosphate was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了利用磷肥副产氟硅酸制备氟硼酸的新工艺。
